Articles.Content: Is there any way to make waypoints on planets and moons? I want to start working on a mission to send Jeb to all the points of interest on each world and I can not seem to figure out how to set a waypoint.

Use a flag. You have to find the area and leave an object there so you can veiw it from the tracking station or whenever you get close enough, rather than leaving ships or kerbals there I'd leave a flag.
That assumes I have already been there. I want to land Jeb on the Mun and head out in a rover to see them for the first time. I would love a waypoint but if I have to I can use the coordinates.
Exactly. You have to find it yourself first, then leave a marker.
